name: doc-scanner-client
description: Scan one or more folders and show the (office/PDF) documents in your browser. Supports comments and tagging.

scripts.old:build:domain: npm run clean && parcel build index.html --out-dir ../server/public --public-url https://erikvullings.github.io/mithril-materialized
scripts.build:domain: npm run clean && parcel build index.html --out-dir ../server/public

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)
